articles.title: Traci McGinnis, Healthcare Data Advocate
articles.contents:
Traci McGinnis
          
          
          Home
          Data Analysis
          My Shiny App
          Dear Data Postcard
          About Me
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Traci McGinnis, Healthcare Data Advocate
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            I’m a seasoned leader and strategic thinker with over a
            decade of experience rolling out data strategies to make
            businesses run smoother and boost revenue. With more than 20
            years in the software and service sectors, I’ve honed my
            skills in handling healthcare claim data, procurement data,
            and enterprise data, all while guiding cross-functional
            teams to success.
            I’m all about soaking up knowledge and growing, and I
            pride myself on being emotionally tuned in to my team and
            laser-focused on customers. My true passion lies in using
            informatics and analytics to shake things up, innovate, and
            craft outstanding experiences for customers.
            
            
            Education
            Tufts University School of Medicine |
            Medford, MA
            M.S. in Healthcare Informatics and Analytics | May
            2024
            Awards & Recognition | 2024 Outstanding MS-HIA
            Capstone Award
            Lincoln College | Normal,
            IL
            B.B.A. in Business Management | June 2011
            Awards & Recognition | First Place: Business
            Design Capstone | Summa cum Laude
            
            
            Current Experience
            
            Benefitfocus
            Vice President, Health Informatics | January 2024 -
            Current
            Senior Director, Health Informatics Product Strategy |
            March 2023 - January 2024
            Director, Health Insights | January 2020 - March
            2023
            Senior Manager, HCM Consulting | July 2019 - January
            2020
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Traci McGinnis, Healthcare Data Advocate
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      LinkedIn

articles.title: Hospital Price Transparency Enforcement Activities and Outcomes
articles.description: This analysis outlines the enforcement actions taken by CMS following a compliance review of a hospital's obligation to establish, update, and make public a list of standard charges for standard items and services. The data indicates that as more warning notices were given, there was a positive shift in hospitals meeting requirements. [Link to Reference Data](https://data.cms.gov/resources/hospital-price-transparency-enforcement-activities-and-outcomes-methodology)

articles.title: Dear Data Postcard
articles.description: My dear data postcard was created after tracking work meetings for one week. I focused on multiple variables, including day of the week, length of meeting, internal or external attendees, and meeting effectiveness.

articles.title: Traci McGinnis
articles.contents:
Traci McGinnis
          
          
          Home
          Data Analysis
          My Shiny App
          Dear Data Postcard
          About Me
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Traci McGinnis
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Executive Perspectives
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Blog
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Welcome to my Online Portfolio!
            Here, you’ll find a collection of a few of the projects
            highlighting my journey through the Master of Science in
            Health Informatics and Analytics (MS-HIA) program at Tufts
            University School of Medicine, specifically work from the
            course on Data Visualization.
            Additionally, explore details about my professional
            background, including my passion for transforming healthcare
            through claim data price transparency and data access.
            Whether you’re interested in healthcare analytics,
            informatics, or my professional journey, this platform
            serves as a glimpse into some of my work and aspirations.
            I’m delighted you stopped by!
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Traci McGinnis

articles.title: The Best Video Games Based on Parent Choices and Critic Ratings
articles.description: For one of our projects, we created a Video Game Selector for Parents using Shiny App
